attributes.action: ask the Queen to annul the whole of Parliament until an honest, equitable and ethical form of democracy can be implemented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Queen should appoint an interim Government of the good until such time as a new form of incorruptible democratic process can be implemented.

A system that removes temptation from the participants, encourages selflessness and integrity is required.
